meanings.definition: A person who operates, builds, or designs rockets.
meanings.sent1: The rocketeers at the space center are preparing for the next launch.
meanings.sent2: The team of rocketeers successfully launched a satellite into orbit.
meanings.sent3: The rocketeers had a friendly competition to see who could build the fastest rocket.
meanings.sent4: She was a true rocketeer, always reaching for the stars in her designs.
meanings.sent5: The group of rocketeers worked tirelessly to perfect their rocket design.

meanings.definition: To engage in the operation or construction of rockets.
meanings.sent1: They rocketeered through the night to finish building the spacecraft on time.
meanings.sent2: The engineers rocketeered to troubleshoot the engine issue before the launch.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to rocketeer a small rocket out of household items for fun.
meanings.sent4: The company will need to rocketeer a new strategy to compete in the space industry.
meanings.sent5: He rocketeered with passion, knowing that every detail mattered for the mission's success.
